code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Navbar.css";import logo from'./Logo/logoveia.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigation=[{link:'fotografias',text:'Fotografias'},{link:'videos',text:'Vídeos'},{link:'areaPessoal',text:'Administração'}];const[isOpen,setOpen]=useState(false);const toggle=()=>setOpen(!isOpen);const hide=()=>setOpen(false);const show=()=>setOpen(true);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"/home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",className:"logo ".concat(isOpen?'hide':'')})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"menu-toggle",onClick:toggle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"menu ".concat(isOpen?'cross':'hamburger')})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"menu-links ".concat(isOpen?'show':''),children:navigation.map(nav=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:nav.link,onClick:toggle,onBlur:hide,onFocus:show,children:nav.text})},nav.text))})]})});};export default Navbar;
